title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4022.22 - Limitation on punitive powers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4022.22 - Limitation on punitive powers

State Regulations

The punitive powers of the stewards provided for in any
section of this Article are limited to the powers provided for in sections
4022.12 through
4022.15
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4022.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
